execute.no_guild: Please use this command in the server you want to edit settings for

target_format.repository: `owner/repository`, a GitHub HTTPS link, a GitHub SSH link
target_format.label: `<hexColor emoji>` *(to work properly the bot needs to be on the server the emoji is from and the emoji names have to match the color codes of the github labels without leading `#`)*

add.no_args: Please provide valid {{target}} to add. Valid format: {{- format}}.
add.title: The following {{target}} have been enabled on this guild / server:

remove.no_args: Please provide valid {{target}} to remove. Valid format: {{- format}}.
remove.no_current: This guild / server does not have any {{target}} enabled at this time.
remove.title: The following {{target}} have been disabled on this guild / server:

list.no_current: This guild / server does not have any {{target}} enabled at this time.
list.title: The following {{target}} are enabled on this guild / server:

execute.no_token: Could not access GitHub token to use.

execute.post_ping: Don't think this means anything special! {{ping}}ms

execute.no_guild: tags can only be used inside a guild / server

execute.missing_arguments: no tag name or user provided
